issue.title: Update model paths on both gzclient and gzserver at runtime

content.raw: I think that solution will probably be more involved than that, it would be interesting to write some tests to make sure that the models listed under that directory are insertable and all their resources work correctly on both server and client.
content.html: I think that solution will probably be more involved than that, it would be interesting to write some tests to make sure that the models listed under that directory are insertable and all their resources work correctly on both server and client.
